msbt.message: Ohmigosh, !The first big event on is almost here! Just imagining what it could be gets me SO EXCITED. We're going to have so much fun! Probably!

Tomorrow's the day. First event on !It's going to be a totally special day for the island. And for me! I get to practice standing in front of a crowd!They might not know they're supposed to look at me and cheer, but that's OK. I'm only practicing.
Next Saturday is the Fishing Tourney! I can't wait, !I have to start thinking about what I'm going to wear. I've got to look good when I accept my trophy
Tomorrow's the Fishing Tourney!I kind of want to catch a BIG one and win! But I also kind of want to catch a small oneThey're waaaay cuter and would fit in my house better.

The Bug-Off is THIS Saturday!I've been practicing being super quiet since you can't make noise or you'll scare off the buggies.Check it out See? Totes quiet Totes<10_4 /> YEAH! No bug is going to hear ME!I guess I need to practice more, huh?
Tomorrow's the Bug-Off, huh?I bought a tr√®s glamorous new net the other day and I am so excited to introduce it to some buggies!

The fireworks show is tomorrow! I am SO excited I could EXPLODE before the fireworks do! I have so many questions! Like, how big will they be? How bright? How loud, ? I plan to use fireworks in my future concerts, so I'm not just a fireworks fan, I'm doing legit research here.

Oh yeah! , we get the results from Happy Home Academy tomorrow!I'm feeling pretty good about my interior design this time!The only thing I'm worried about is if the judge will, you know, understand my style

Have you already seen the Happy Home Academy results, ? How did you do? Ihaven't looked at my score yet.I feel so weirdfolks I don't know, looking in my windows and telling me what they thinkBut I also love winning prizes, so I leave my blinds wide open and my front door unlocked!
I'm SO amped for the new year!We're going to have a BLAST at the Countdown party on the 31st in the plaza! It's going to go ALL. NIGHT.
Last day of tomorrow! It feels like the year flew by! But also dragged. But also flew!WEIRD, RIGHT?You have to have to HAVE to join us for the New Year's Eve Countdown and party into the new year!

I'm so excited for May 1st, aka May Day! There's a special May Day event happening off-island. Taking an airplane ride to a party? It's just so glamorous, ! I wonder what the island is like Maybe Wilbur will tell us No. I don't want any spoilers. Keep it together, !

Tomorrow is May Day, and I am beyond excited, .All the special May Day stuff takes place on a different island, and you'll need a May Day Ticket to get there. Go talk to Tom Nook tomorrow, and he'll tell you how to get your hands on one. Then all that'll be left to do is hop on a plane and party like it's May 1st!
